table.caption: Table 103 – Entries in a Usage Application Dictionary
head: Key
Type
Value
rows: (Required) A name defining the situation in which this usage application dictionary should be used. Shall be one of View, Print, or Export.

(Optional) An array listing the optional content groups that shall have their states automatically managed based on information in their usage dictionary. Default value: an empty array, indicating that no groups is affected.

(Required) An array of names, each of which corresponds to a usage dictionary entry. When managing the states of the optional content groups in the OCGs array, each of the corresponding categories in the group’s usage dictionary is considered.
